quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.text: I think, therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: You had become to me what Mona Lisa is to the rest of the world—an artistic excellence, wrought from the hand of a Master intent on sculpting his finest work, but you, my dear, remain unmarred by the hands of man!
quotes.author: Gabriel Ayuba

quotes.text: Write codes that are easy to delete, not easy to scale.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Write codes that are easy to delete, not easy to scale
quotes.author: Unknown
